sen.j: 行会（ぎょうえ、689年 - ?）は、奈良時代の僧。
sen.e: Gyoe (689 - date of death unknown) was a priest in the Nara period.
Gyoe (689-date of death unknown) was a priest in the Nara period.
sen.cmt: ハイフン前後のスペース削除しました。
sen.e: Gyoe (689-date of death unknown) was a priest in the Nara period.

sen.j: 摂津国住吉郡大国里出身。
sen.e: He was from Okuni-no-Sato, Sumiyoshi County, Settsu Province.
He was from OkuninoSato, Sumiyoshi County, Settsu Province.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: He was from OkuninoSato, Sumiyoshi County, Settsu Province.

sen.j: 728年（戊申年神亀5年）に飛鳥寺で受戒した。
sen.e: In 728, he received religious precepts at Asuka-dera Temple.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 728, he received religious precepts at Asuka-dera Temple.
In 728, he received religious precepts at Asuka-dera Temple.

sen.j: 743年（天平15年）に西琳寺に住した。
sen.e: He started to stay at Sairin-ji Temple in 743.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He started to stay at Sairin-ji Temple in 743.
He started to stay at Sairin-ji Temple in 743.
